scout

Class AppState

  • java.lang.Object
    • scout.AppState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class AppState
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class represents one application state of the SUT. The root applications state is called Home and is the starting point for a test suite. An application state may contain actions that leads to other application states. It may also contain checks and defects and have a bookmark to be able to refer to the application state without using the id.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public int coveredPercent(java.lang.String productVersion,
                          boolean untilHome)
        Get the state coverage in percent for a product version until we reach the home state
        Parameters:
        productVersion - The product version
        untilHome - true if coverage until the home state is reached or false if coverage in entire tree
